about_the_game:
About trapped animals in cages


The primitive people only realized the fear of no moonlight when they first entered the cave, and the damp atmosphere of a lack of fresh air declared their isolation from freedom. This is the cage of trapped animals, as well as the seed that nurtures numbness. The snake worms that grind their teeth and suck blood, and the fellow countrymen who lift their stone axes, have turned this place into the best breeding ground for death. What is escape and how can we escape?

About disposable society


Hello everyone, I am HKHcutest, the main reminder and program for "Trapped Beasts in a Cage", a member of the One-Time Society. Thank you for clicking in.

All members of the One-Time Society are high school seniors. After completing this game, all members will leave their hometown and scatter around the world.

So we mock ourselves and say that during our one-time high school graduation vacation, we gather together and play a one-time game that everyone will never open again after watching it. That's what we call a one-time club.

The production process is very realistic, and the script for "Trapped Beast in a Cage" was chosen more because it has fewer characters and can be completed in less than three months. The graduation vacation is not so idle, and the technical level is average among peers.

The script is too short, the art resources are limited, and we don't have our own music, but we still managed to create it. Even if it was a one-time event, the one-time club completed its mission. Just like "Trapped Beast in a Cage" transformed from a school life novel to an FDS of many places, everyone in the one-time society has a new identity and a story.

And the people of the disposable society are not disposable, and everyone who may or may not reunite will definitely have better and better works.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains a lot of direct descriptions of violent content, as well as mild sexual hints.

name: 笼中困兽

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS:
  • Processor:
  • Memory: 2.0 GB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: Trapped in a Cage is a text adventure game developed by Disposable Club, where players will witness various events beyond human rationality that occur in an anti utopian prison. This is a small incision in a turbulent world, and also a brief moment of endless human nature.
